唔知有冇人想入MAEC啦，我就post出嚟畀有興趣嘅人睇下。
內容都有少少關於common core嘅嘢，嗰一part就想入科大嘅人啱用。

JS5813 (BSc in Mathematics and Economics, 簡稱：MAEC)

1. 收生條件：

科大係睇4C+2X

科大本身都對英數有weighting嘅，而MAEC都唔例外。
MAEC呢個major亦都要求英文最低要有4, 如果冇4 只能夠靠入Science School再用GPA揀MAEC喇（但都要求兩個科大英文course B-或以上）

Weighting:
中文&通識 x1
英文 x2
Core數 x2
Best Science Subject x1.5
（如果M1/M2 高分過你個science subject，科大就會count M1/2, 而且M1/2個weighting係x2嘅）
Other subject x1
（如果有Econ，Econ x1.5 所以有讀過Econ對入MAEC嚟講都幾重要）

你可能會擔心中學冇讀Econ點樣讀MAEC？我識人中學冇讀Econ都入咗嚟MAEC，咁佢讀嘅Econ course就係bb班嚟嘅，所以唔需要太擔心～

2. MAEC讀咩㗎？

有好多人一聽到MAEC就問我係咪double major嚟，其實就唔係，佢只係一個major，但兩個major嘅內容。

先講下Math嗰邊會讀啲咩：

以下係year 1嘅數學course


MATH1012 (Calculus IA) (For中學冇M1/2嘅人)
呢個course就個個科大新學生都要讀嘅
內容係由頭教calculus教到教哂成個differentiation, 再教多少少integration咁啦。Course內容唔難，唔明可以問lecturer或者TA, 佢地都好樂意解答你地嘅問題。

MATH1013 (Calculus IB) (For中學有M1/2嘅人)
同樣，呢個course就個個科大新學生都要讀嘅
內容同MATH1012相同。即係中學讀過，上到嚟科大會重新讀多一次。同唔好輕視呢個course，考嘅內容隨時難過中學學過嘅好多。

咁如果你係揀Business major嘅，又冇讀M1/2，咁你個Math course會係MATH1003
內容係好簡單嘅Financial Math, limit, differentiation, integration同埋Matrix

MATH1014 (Calculus II)
呢個係MATH1012/1013嘅下集，內容最主要係integration同埋infinite series。
好多人讀infinite series讀到狗咁，係因為infinite series係pure math嘅嘢，考都係考你prove佢嘅convergence.
Integration嗰part就好多M2仔都學過
不過M1仔都唔需要驚，努力都可以有好grade
（利申：M1仔，1014 A咗）

以下係year 2嘅數學course


MATH2023 (Multivariable Calculus)
呢個course就係讀喺3D space (x,y,z) 下嘅calculus。冇咩特別嘢介紹

MATH2121 (Linear Algebra)
M2學嘅Linear algebra其實好輕鬆（相比之下）
呢個course會學嘅內容多過M2好多
M2仔唔好以為學過就hea讀。

MATH2411 (Applied Statistics)
呢個係入門Stat course，頭4個chapter (0-3) 都係M1讀過嘅內容，好易明。但係之嘅內容就係全新嘅
M1仔唔好以為學過可以hea讀。

MATH2033 (Mathematical Analysis)
呢個係Analysis嘅入門course。瘋狂Prove數啦準備！！

以下係year 3嘅數學course


MATH3033 (Real Analysis)
佢係最後一個core數course，之後嘅數course都係elective嚟，自己決定揀邊個同埋幾時讀。

MAEC Math Elective 一覽：
MATH 3423 Statistical Inference
MATH 3425 Stochastic Modeling
MATH 3426 Sampling
MATH 4321 Game Theory
MATH 4335 Introduction to Optimization
MATH 4422 Data Analysis
MATH 4423 Nonparametric Statistics
--------------------------------------------------------------------
MATH 4427 Loss Models and Credibility Theory
MATH 4511 Quantitative Methods for Fixed Income Derivatives
MATH 4512 Fundamentals of Mathematical Finance
MATH 4513 Life Contingencies Models and Insurance Risk

前者都係Statistics course，後者就係Financial Math course

值得留意嘅係科大雖然冇精算major，但有精算minor。minor入面幾個course都係以上elective list度出現，所以唔少人都會minor埋精算。
但如果想繼續讀上去嘅話我建議take多啲elective course好啲。

再講下Econ讀啲咩：
留意返，MAEC係year 2先開始讀Econ course
--------------------------------------------------------------------

以下係year2會讀嘅econ course

ECON2103 (Introduction to Microeconomics)
同MATH1012個concept一樣，係for中學冇讀過Econ嘅人
內容係讀成個micro（例如：Opportunity cost, PPF, Demand and Supply, Cost and Benefit）有少少game theory。

ECON2113(Microeconomics)
呢個就for中學有讀過Econ嘅人
內容同ECON2103一樣
相比中學多咗啲內容。
（我個中學同學走哂堂最後都A）

ECON3113 (Microeconomics Theory I)
呢個course係focus consumer嗰邊嘅，同時有大量數學
讀呢個course嘅人全部唔係MAEC就係ECOF，BBA ECON係唔會讀呢個course。

ECON3123 (Macroeconomics Theory I)
呢個course係focus IS-LM model同埋 AD-AS model. 同埋呢個course有個assumption係there is no international trade

以下係year3會讀嘅econ course

ECON3133 (Microeconomics Theory II)
呢個course係講production嗰邊嘅
留意返，course introduction寫住Multivariable calculus will be used extensively
MATH2023個底要打好啲

ECON3143 (Macroeconomics Theory II)
既然Macro Theory II assume there is no international trade, 呢個course會加返上去，數學嘅數量相對少。

ECON3334 (Introduction to Econometrics)
呢個course就好似一個stat course咁。

（因為小弟升year 2, 上述內容可能有錯，有錯凡請咁多位科大師兄指正。）

ECON 4254 Law and Economics
ECON 4284 Econometrics for cross-sectional and Panel Data
ECON 4304 Time series Econometrics and Business Forecasting
ECON 4334 Money and Banking

ECON 4374 International Macroeconomics and Finance
ECON 4384 Globalization: Trade, Investment and Exchange Rate
ECON 4434 Economic Development and Growth

以下為common core course list:
——————————————————————————————————
LANG＋LABU：

LANG1002(A/S/I) & LANG1003(A/S/I)
呢兩個為所有科大仔都要讀嘅英文course。
未開sem（8月尾）已經要人返嚟考個pre-ELPA（一個類似IELTS嘅英文水平試）
當然可以exclude呢個course，但exclude嘅條件係:
1) IELTS overall 7分or above, 冇一個細grade低過6.5
2) DSE overall 5* or above, 冇一個細grade低過5 （呢個唔sure，有印象聽professor講過呢個條件）

Program-based（JUPAS直入）MAEC嘅人同business school嘅人一樣都係要讀 Language for Business（簡稱係LABU）
新制LABU變咗兩個course，而MAEC要讀嘅就係：
LABU 2040 (Business Case Analyses)
LABU 2060 (Effective Communication in Business)

同埋LANG／LABU course最慘就係遇到killer（指會派爛grade嘅Prof/Lecturer/Tutor)
可能因為一科lang而拉低哂成個CGA
——————————————————————————————————
Humanities + Social Science
喺科大讀嘅人點都要讀2個HUMA
一個係 SSC-H
得HUMA1000/1001 & SHSS3001揀，但勝在呢三科都幾靚grade
但workload重

一個係 H
就係讀一個HUMA course（唔可以係HUMA1000/1001, 因為佢地係SSC）
例如有：
HUMA 1720讀Logic
HUMA 1810讀中哲
HUMA 2820讀孔子
等等

而Social Science歸類為 SA。SA內唔係淨係得Social Science，仲有ISOM、MGMT呢類商科。

SSC-SA
有得揀ISOM，ISOM係 Information System and Operation Management嘅簡稱
有得揀MGMT，啫係Management
有得揀SOSC，啫係social science

SA
多啲選擇

ECON

SSC-S&T

今年考生入乞食科前要問自己的問題 by亞里士多德

（1）自己鍾唔鍾意錢同優厚嘅物質生活？
（2）如果而家唔鍾意錢，係咪肯定幾年之後都唔會改變初衷？
（3）屋企經濟能力係高到讀乞食科都無所謂?
（4）如果真係好有興趣，你揀嗰個乞食科目嘅知識係咪只可以從大學嘅途徑獲取？有冇可能自己睇書學到？
（5）到時乞食真係唔會後悔？
（6）好多人話到時唔會後悔嘅結果真係後悔，你肯定真係唔會後悔？
（7）如果你係想行學術路徑，你有足夠能力打嬴其他對手？
（8）你有足夠嘅時間同埋恆心（大約10年）潛心於學術？(好多讀PhD 都會中途quit,嗰陣已經30歲又好少工作經驗比較難搵工）
（9） 你忍受到10年之後啲中學同學事業有成但係自己比唔上？
（10）你自己係咪人中之龍,讀乜嘢科都可以成功？

認真諗下呢啲問題先好去排Jupas
年年都好多人後悔然後要quit u, transfer。
年年又好多人畢業搵唔到工然後後悔當初揀錯科

我見有咁多準freshman對trans major同揀major都有好大誤解 所以特登想係到講一講

所謂既揀major 係你入左個school之後declare你個school入面有既major/跨school合辦既program/ipo (ipo你可以諗成係有多1個特別既school開辦跨engine science同business既program)

Science揀到既major如下
1.1 Science school based:
(ENVS) Environmental Science
(BCB) Biochemistry and Cell Biology
(BISC) Biological Science
(BIOT) Biotechnology
(CHEM) Chemistry
(MATH) Mathematics
(PHYS) Physics

1.2 Science/Business school:
(MAEC) Mathematics and Economics
(BIBU) Biotechnology and Business

1.3 ipo major:
(EVMT) Environmental Management and Technology
(RMBI)Risk Management and Business Intelligence
(IIM) Individualized Interdisciplinary Major
Dual Degree Program in Technology and Management (Engine declare1個major+General Business)

Engine 揀到既major如下
2.1 Engine school based:
(CENG) Chemical Engineering
(CBME) Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering
(CEEV) Chemical and Environmental Engineering
(CIVL) Civil Engineering
(CIEV) Civil and Environmental Engineering
(CPEG) Computer Engineering
(COMP) Computer Science
(ELEC) Electronic Engineering
(IEEM) Industrial Engineering and Engineering Management
(IELM) Logistics Management and Engineering
(AE) Aerospace Engineering
(MECH) Mechanical Engineering
(COSC) Computer Science

2.2 ipo major:
Refer to the list 1.3

Business揀到既major如下
3.1 Business school based:
(ACCT) Professional Accounting
(ECON) Economics
(FINA) Finance
(GBM) General Business Management
(GBUS) Global Business
(IS) Information Systems
(OM) Operations Management
(MARK) Marketing
(MGMT) Management
(ECOF) Economics and Finance
(QFIN) Quantitative Finance

3.2 Science/Business school:
Refer to the list 1.2

3.3 ipo major:
Refer to the list 1.3

GCS skip

收分分面 (講緊gpa not dse)
Science major普遍係有揀就有得入 某幾個major會收得高d eg maec (要gpa>3)
Engine major就 cs civil mech收最高 (cs civil gpa>3先穩陣)
Business major 就得fina is om收得高 (fina收fina2303拎A range既人, is om都要係isom2010/isom2700拎起碼B+)
Ipo: evmt (>3), rmbi (>3.3) dual degree (>3.5), iim新開唔清楚
上面如果漏左major/分數有誤既話科大巴打都可以幫手改

至於trans major就係講緊你入yr1入左個school之後想轉d唔係上面個list講入到既major (as known as入d九唔搭八既major eg science->fina, business -> civil)

1. Trans major會要求gpa高過揀major好多 (eg fina 收外來人收gpa 3.7 唔似business school揀fina咁只需要1個course A range)
揀major既話夠分就得 得ipo/fina/business神科要in人

2. Trans major要有想轉走/轉入個2個dept既 approval (包括要搵head同你傾一傾點解想轉major, 傾條path, 成績等 就算夠gpa都唔一定會批 (eg business想轉civil就算好高gpa都好 見你數學C range都係)

3. Credit
揀major既話基本上係唔會哂左之前讀既credit (因為基本上都係required course)
至於trans major就好多時候之前讀左d credit會浪費哂 (因為讀左d 唔關你新major事既course)
所以要trans major就好早d apply(eg完yr1), 你巳經yr3,4 就基本上無可能trans到 因為要讀番太多course 學校唔比你defer咁多年

GCS skip

收分分面 (講緊gpa not dse)
Science major普遍係有揀就有得入 某幾個major會收得高d eg maec (要gpa>3)
Engine major就 cs civil mech收最高 (cs civil gpa>3先穩陣)
Business major 就得fina is om收得高 (fina收fina2303拎A range既人, is om都要係isom2010/isom2700拎起碼B+)
Ipo: evmt (>3), rmbi (>3.3) dual degree (>3.5), iim新開唔清楚
上面如果漏左major/分數有誤既話科大巴打都可以幫手改

至於trans major就係講緊你入yr1入左個school之後想轉d唔係上面個list講入到既major (as known as入d九唔搭八既major eg science->fina, business -> civil)

1. Trans major會要求gpa高過揀major好多 (eg fina 收外來人收gpa 3.7 唔似business school揀fina咁只需要1個course A range)
揀major既話夠分就得 得ipo/fina/business神科要in人

2. Trans major要有想轉走/轉入個2個dept既 approval (包括要搵head同你傾一傾點解想轉major, 傾條path, 成績等 就算夠gpa都唔一定會批 (eg business想轉civil就算好高gpa都好 見你數學C range都係)

3. Credit
揀major既話基本上係唔會哂左之前讀既credit (因為基本上都係required course)
至於trans major就好多時候之前讀左d credit會浪費哂 (因為讀左d 唔關你新major事既course)
所以要trans major就好早d apply(eg完yr1), 你巳經yr3,4 就基本上無可能trans到 因為要讀番太多course 學校唔比你defer咁多年
